Game.Name: Ever Girl (USA)
Game.plot: You've got big ideas to transform the everView Theater into the everView Cafe! With a little help from your friends, you'll design posters, snap photos and race around town as you prep for the grand opening!http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/926199.html
Game.Notes: Based on the tween lifestyle brand, this action / adventure game contains loads of adventures tailored specifically to the player's personality type. The game allows girls to customize their characters so they can play sports, design fashions, produce music or become an entrepreneur.
